results.title: Richard III (Perspective)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Shakespeare in Perspective Series”.
Designed to give a greater understanding and appreciation of the play by placing it in its historical and social context and by stressing its relevance to a modern day audience. Perspective offered by Rosemary Ann Sisson, author and playwright.

results.title: Slide fasteners
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Shows how to set in slide fasteners; explains why the concealed side openings in dresses and skirts are purposely designed for the side of the garment, and why in others the opening is made in the centre front, or centre back.
results.description:

results.title: Pattern interpretation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Discusses such problems as the interpretation of markings on various well-known commercial patterns; how to determine pattern size, yardage required, and the interpretation of pattern instructions.

results.title: Advanced seams
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Demonstrates the procedure for the following seams: French; slot; flat well; welt; tucked; and piped.

results.title: Simple seams
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Demonstrates the procedures for preparing plain seams with the edges pinked; edges overcast; edges stitched; edges bound; edges catch-stitched; and the edges top-stitched. In each case the procedure for pressing the seam is demonstrated.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.

results.title: Characteristics and handling of materials
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Shows how to handle various types of materials, including cottons, woollens, silks and such synthetic fabrics as rayons, in preparation for sewing.

results.title: Light the deep
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sentinel”.
Defence scientists, using special laser technology, have developed a sophisticated device which will benefit the hydrographers of the world. It is used by the Royal Australian Navy, responsible for the production of all Australian navigational charts.
